SCTX - Script Source:
Scn fbmwCO12Qscript

short falcoguard
short initialized
float timer

begin gamemode

	if falcoguard == 0
		if GetStage fbmwCO12 >= 10
			if timer < 10
				set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
			else
				fbmwBaslodREF.Enable
				fbmwBaslodREF.AddItem 0BonemoldBow 1
				fbmwBaslodREF.AddItem fbmwDireViperarrow 5
				fbmwBaslodREF.EquipItem 0BonemoldBow
				fbmwBaslodREF.EquipItem fbmwDireViperarrow
				fbmwBaslodREF.StartCombat fbmwFalcoREF
				set timer to 0
				set falcoguard to 1
			endif
		endif
	endif

	if GetStage fbmwCO12 == 10
		if fbmwFalcoREF.GetLOS fbmwBaslodREF == 1
			fbmwBaslodREF.StopCombat 
			fbmwBaslodREF.StopCombat
		elseif timer > 3
			if falcoguard == 1
				SetStage fbmwCO12 20
				set timer to 0
				set falcoguard to 2
			endif
		else
			set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
		endif
	endif
	if falcoguard == 2
		if timer < 2
			set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
		else
			set falcoguard to 3
		endif
	elseif falcoguard == 3
		fbmwGarnasguardREF.StartCombat fbmwBaslodREF
		fbmwAferguardREF.StartCombat fbmwBaslodREF
		fbmwGratianguardREF.StartCombat fbmwBaslodREF
		set falcoguard to 4
	elseif falcoguard == 4
		fbmwCimberSValerius.Enable
		fbmwCapitonSPopillius.Enable
		fbmwCimberSValerius.StartCombat fbmwFalcoREF
		fbmwCapitonSPopillius.StartCombat fbmwFalcoREF
		set falcoguard to 5
	endif
	if GetStage fbmwCO12 >= 20
		if falcoguard >=4
			if fbmwBaslodREF.GetDead == 1
				fbmwGarnasguardREF.StartCombat fbmwCimberSValerius
				fbmwGarnasguardREF.StartCombat fbmwCapitonSPopillius
				fbmwAferguardREF.StartCombat fbmwCimberSValerius
				fbmwAferguardREF.StartCombat fbmwCapitonSPopillius
				fbmwGratianguardREF.StartCombat fbmwCimberSValerius
				fbmwGratianguardREF.StartCombat fbmwCapitonSPopillius
			endif
		endif
	endif
	if falcoguard == 5
		if fbmwCimberSValerius.GetDead == 1
			if fbmwCapitonSPopillius.GetDead == 1
				fbmwGarnasguardREF.StopCombat 
				fbmwAferguardREF.StopCombat 
				fbmwGratianguardREF.StopCombat
				SetStage fbmwCO12 100
				set falcoguard to 6
			endif
		endif
	endif
end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 1080 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
